lines.gurmukhi: sill mY Drin Drin mY sill jYsy; kUp AnrUp kY ibml jl Cwey hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: As there is land in water and water inside Earth, like a well that is dug up to obtain neat and cold water;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: sill mY Drin Drin mY sill jYsy ijs pRkwr jl ivKy jl dy Awsry DrqI hY qy DrqI dy Q`ly jl hI jl hox kr ky mwnoˆ DrqI ivc jl hY ieh g`l sB jwxdy hn pRMqU kUp AnrUp kY KUh dy sdrS kIiqAwˆ Bwv DrqI ivc p`itAwˆ hI ibml jl Cwey hY inrml jl Cwey psirAw pRgitAw pRwpq hoieAw krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qwhI jl mwtI kY bnweI Gitkw Anyk; eykY jlu Gt Gt Gitkw smwey hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: The same water and earth are used for making pots and pitchers and all of them contain the same type of water.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Aqy aupRMq qwhI iqsI hI ausy hI jl mwtI kY jl im`tI qoˆ ienwˆ nUM Awpo ivc go ky iek qoˆ do hoieAwˆ nUM muV ie`k kr ky, bxweI dIAwˆ hn Gitkw GVIAwˆ Anykwˆ pr jy ivcwr ky q`kIey qwˆ ie`ko pwxI hI jo GVy dI rcnw dw kwrx sI Enwˆ Gt Gt Gitkw mY smwey hY GiVAwˆ mtikAwˆ Aru GVIAwˆ ivc nÎwrw nÎwrw ho ky smwieAw huMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jwhI jwhI Gitkw mY idRstI kY dyKIAq; pyKIAq Awpw Awpu Awn n idKwey hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Whichever pot or pitcher one looks into, one would see the same image in it, and nothing else is seen,

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ArQwq ijs ijs GVI ivc ingHw kr ky pswr ky 'dyKIAq' dyKIdw hY, 'pyKIAq Awpw Awpu' q`kn ivc AOˆdw hY Awp jl hI Awp jl, 'Awn n idKwey hY' hor kuC nhIˆ dKweI idMdw[ Bwv jl ivcoˆ DrqI aupjn smwn cYqMnÎ smuMdr ivcoˆ pRikrqI mwXw pRgt ho ky cYqMn purK dy AwDwr iesiQq ho, jd muV aukq cYqMn purK Apxy kwrx srUp nwl sMjog pRwpq huMdI hY qwˆ GVy GVIAwˆ smwn AnMq srIr rUp ho BwsdI hY, Aru AYsIAwˆ AnMq srIr rUp aupwDIAwˆ ivKy jIv Awqmw rUp ho kr cYqMn s`qw AnMq srUpI ho BwisAw krdI hY[ jd igAwn ibbyk idRStI dÍwrw dyiKAw jwvy qwˆ bs sB dw Awpw rUp Awp hI auh AnuBv ivKy AwXw krdw hY dUsrw kuC idRStI nhIˆ AwXw krdw[

lines.gurmukhi: pUrn bRhm gur eykMkwr ky Akwr; bRhm ibbyk eyk tyk Thrwey hY [110[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Similarly the complete God pervades in the form of a-Guru and appear in the hearts of Sikhs (as was the case of image in various water-filled pots and pitchers). (110)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: b`s ieh vIcwr hY ijs nUM pUrn bRhm srUp gurU eykMkwr Sbd igAwn dÍwry kY Awkwr pRgt kr ky bRhm ibbyk bRhm igAwn rwhIˆ gur is`K nUM iesy hI iek ivKy eyk Tihrwey hY eyk rUp kr ky itkw idMdy iesiQqI krw idMdy hn ]110]
